About Me

Hello, I'm Varun Kolanu , born in Hyderabad, a first-year student pursuing Computer Science and Engineering at IIT (BHU) Varanasi.


I have always been fascinated by the world of technology and its endless possibilities. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I possess a versatile skill set that allows me to bring ideas to life across the full stack.


Beyond code, I find immense joy in animation and sketching . Spirituality holds a special place in my life, guiding my journey with a sense of purpose and inner peace. Hobbies include playing Chess .
